ygData.subject: Re: Runed totem staffs...buying them
ygData.msgSnippet: The Runed Totem Staff is *far* from the best weapon for us. It is really the first magic weapon available and the going rate on Tarew Marr is 20pp to 40pp,
ygData.messageBody:
The Runed Totem Staff is *far* from the "best" weapon for us. It is really
the "first" magic weapon available and the going rate on Tarew Marr is 20pp
to 40pp, with 20pp being the "norm."

Djar Lightbringer(Tarew Marr Server)
Servant of Light, Deliverer of the Truth to Norrath
